overview: Luscious foreign enchantress Nikita is part of a money-making scheme in which beautiful foreign girls are hooked up with wealthy American men for marriage, citizenship and cash. A lucrative arrangement that could bring her all the creature comforts a life of luxury can provide. The problem is that this nasty nymph is having too much fun screwing around with the wedding gown designer and the masseur to actually make it to the altar.
title: Naughty Nikita
